text: Hagi ama'i ugagota hu'za hankavenentake sondia vahetamima Deviti'ma aza hu'za Israeli vahete kvama azeri oti'naza vahetamine. Hagi Ra Anumzamo'ma Israeli vahete kini manigahie hu'nea kante ante'za ama ana hankavenentake sondia vahetmimo'zane maka Israeli vahe'mo'zanena mago zamarimpa hu'za Devitina kinia azeri oti'naze.
